duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead environmental staff in coordinating environmental work for projects and programs across the company.
Supervise and coordinate activities, interactions with various departments and disciplines across the company.
Oversee the implementation of environmental assessment, review, permitting, and approval processes and programs.
Work with governmental agencies and consultants/contractors providing services to the company.
Establish systems to maintain compliance with environmental regulations and reduce environmental risk and liability.
Develop and coordinate environmental awareness, training, and outreach efforts to support project development.
Establish and oversee construction support processes, handle environmental budgets and costs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related field (e.g., environmental studies, physical sciences, engineering), Master’s degree or professional certification desirable
